nodes.text: Squad Five, assigned to the M-class Imperial Attack Transport Regina Cayli during the Galactic Civil War, was a unit of stormtroopers serving the Galactic Empire.

Squad Five was featured in the roleplaying adventure "Regina Cayli", first published in 1987's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games. In 1994, it was subsequently reprinted in the first issue of the Star Wars Adventure Journal.

Due to the nature of the adventure, it is possible for the player to never encounter Squad Five as they are only called upon if the player, as Roark Garnet, is discovered while infiltrating the Regina Cayli.
